Heisei Matsue Kaidan: Ayashi: A Matsue City collaboration anime with Eagle Talon. Yoshida book-ends the story as horror tales, both modern and historical, originated within the city are narrated by another person.

['Himitsukessha Taka no Tsume Gaiden: Mukashi no Yoshida-kun', 'Yoshida no Matsue Beauty Daisakusen', 'Yoshida no Matsue Beauty Daisakusen Prologue', 'Yoshida no Time Slip Fumai-kou', '3-bu de Wakaru Koizumi Yakumo no Kaidan', 'Matsue Kankou Taishi Sanri ga Iku! Matsue Ghost Tour', 'Heisei Matsue Kaidan']
